A very effective move, Ino uses this as a quick knock-out move on a opponent. She slaps and kicks with flower petals trailing from her hands and feet around her body.

== Trivia ==
* This move can be customised to other characters in ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2]]'' and ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3]]''.
* In [[The Guy with Zero Motivation!!|chapter 107]] and [[Zero Motivation: The Guy with Cloud Envy!|episode 64]] of the ''[[Naruto (series)|Naruto]]'' series, Ino told [[Shikamaru]] to perform a combo of the same specific number of hits on [[Temari]].

[[es:16 Hit-Combo]]
[[id:16 Pukulan Kombo]]
[[pl:Jūroku Ren Konbo]]
